about_the_game:
Hozy — where creative chaos meets cozy transformation!

In Hozy, take on the challenge of turning rundown, neglected spaces into warm, stylish rooms with an array of cleaning, painting, and decorating tools. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of dusty, forgotten interiors, where every corner awaits your touch. Scrub floors, paint walls, set the perfect lighting, and watch as each dilapidated room becomes a cozy masterpiece!

Satisfying cleaning mechanics: customizable tools, animations, and visually rewarding cleaning effects!
Creative freedom: choose colors, decorate, and experiment with interior designs.

Simple, intuitive controls: manage light, warmth, and brightness settings, with smooth camera handling for full immersion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 or AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Transform abandoned spaces into cozy havens in Hozy! Clean, paint, and decorate neglected rooms with intuitive controls and satisfying mechanics. Unleash your creativity as you customize each space, turning dust and grime into warmth and style. Create comfort one room at a time!
